properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 08, DNC 19.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ IN
47-17.28N 022-47.58W AT 022129Z MAR.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO UK COAST GUARD,
PHONE: 4434 4382 0025, FAX: 4413 2924 4547,
E-MAIL: UKMRCC@HMCG.GOV.UK.
